is_unit_iff_norm:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℚ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ring_of_integers -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℚ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℚ -/
theorem is_unit_iff_norm [number_field K] (x : (ring_of_integers) K) :
    IsUnit x ↔ |(ring_of_integers.norm (exprℚ) x : exprℚ)| = 1 :=
  by
  convert(ring_of_integers.is_unit_norm (exprℚ)).symm
  rw [← abs_one, abs_eq_abs, ← rat.ring_of_integers.is_unit_iff]
#align is_unit_iff_norm is_unit_iff_norm
is_unit_iff:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →+* » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ring_of_integers -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℚ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ring_of_integers -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℚ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℚ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℚ -/
/-

Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.

theorem rat.ring_of_integers.is_unit_iff {x : (ring_of_integers) (exprℚ)} :
    IsUnit x ↔ (x : exprℚ) = 1 ∨ (x : exprℚ) = -1 := by
  simp_rw [(is_unit_map_iff (rat.ring_of_integers_equiv : «expr →+* » ((ring_of_integers) (exprℚ)) ℤ) x).symm,
    Int.isUnit_iff, RingEquiv.coe_toRingHom, RingEquiv.map_eq_one_iff, RingEquiv.map_eq_neg_one_iff, ←
    subtype.coe_injective.eq_iff, AddSubgroupClass.coe_neg, algebraMap.coe_one]
#align rat.ring_of_integers.is_unit_iff rat.ring_of_integers.is_unit_iff
